short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides AI-driven technical analysis for any chart with one single click, powered by ChartAI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Having a hard time analyzing the market? We got you covered. ChartEye will help you make better decisions. Simply click on the ChartEye extension icon while viewing a chart (e.g. on TradingView) and we will do the rest.

Analyzing charts can be a daunting task, especially for those new to trading. Charts are often cluttered with a myriad of lines, patterns, and indicators, making it difficult to decipher meaningful insights. The volatile nature of the crypto market further complicates this task, as prices can fluctuate wildly in a short period, demanding constant vigilance and quick decision-making. Without proper analysis, traders are at risk of making uninformed decisions, potentially leading to significant losses.

This is where ChartEye comes in â€“ a game-changer in simplifying and enhancing the analysis of crypto charts. Our AI-driven tool is designed to tackle the complexities of chart analysis head-on. By employing advanced algorithms, it can quickly identify key patterns, trends, and potential trading signals that might be easily missed by the human eye. This not only saves time but also increases the accuracy of your trading decisions.

Whether you're browsing market charts or analyzing potential investments, ChartEye is the perfect tool for quick, accurate, and hassle-free crypto chart analysis. Simplify your trading process, save valuable time, and gain a competitive edge with this must-have extension for any trader.

ChartEye supports TA output for the following 21 languages: Arabic, Catalan, Chinese, English, French, German, Hebrew, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish and Vietnamese.

Disclaimer: when clicking the extension icon, a new tab will open with the technical analysis. On this page there will also be a small advertisement at the bottom.
